title: What Is 'Jugging?' The Meaning Of 'Jugg' The Viral TikTok Slang Term Explained
description: "Jugging" is the newest AAVE slang term to become so-called "brainrot." Here's where it comes from, what it means and how it's used online.
content:
TikTok users have begun spreading a new slang term called "jugging," which is confusing people not familiar with its history in rap and hip-hop music.
To "jugg" is a piece of AAVE slang that's turne… [+1544 chars]
author: Owen Carry
